text: Clivipollia fragaria is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family PisaniidaeRosenberg, G. (2014). Clivipollia fragaria (W. Wood, 1828). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=493991 on 2015-02-16 ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Aldabra. ==References== * Abbott, R.T. & S.P. Dance (1986). Compendium of sea shells. American Malacologists, Inc:Melbourne, Florida ==External links== * Category:Pisaniidae Category:Gastropods described in 1828
title: Clivipollia fragaria
